about_the_game:
Embark on an exhilarating journey into the heart of aerial warfare with Splash One, a military flight simulator that strikes the perfect balance between realism and accessibility. Experience the thrill of piloting cutting-edge fighter jets in high-stakes dogfights above the clouds. Whether you're a seasoned pilot or a newcomer to the skies, Splash One offers an engaging and immersive experience without the need for a Ph.D. in aviation.

Some of the features include:

  • Aircraft destruction

  • Realistic flight physics (lift, thrust, drag, and weight that is affected by the aircraft's fuel and payload)
  • Customizable loadouts
  • Radar

  • Guns
  • Unguided, Laser and GPS guided bombs
  • Semi-active radar homing missile
  • Infrared homing missile
  • Active radar homing missile
  • Ejection seat

name: Splash One

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64 bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64 bit Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Soar into intense aerial combat with Splash One, a flight simulator offering accessible realism. Whether you're a novice or a seasoned pilot, experience the thrill of dogfights without the need for a Ph.D. in aviation.
